Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Traveling with nomad Michael Ladden and his Drive the Globe expedition vehicle; heading to Utah to go dual sport riding; a look at the Glaciers to Geysers Trek: A Tale of Fire and Ice.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team travels to Oregon for the Bend Overland Expo and visits places like Crater Lake National Park; testing the Opus OP15 off-road trailer which sleeps four and has a full outdoor kitchen and solar power to live off-grid.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Traveling to Whistler Canada to go mountain biking at North America's premiere mountain bike Park and going four wheeling; an inside look at project Toyota Tundra build for overlanding.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Hitting Alaska to go four wheeling, helicopter to a glacier to go dog sledding, then trying ziplining and taking a train ride; building a used 2017 Toyota 4Runner for overlanding, and showing why this SUV is so popular.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team travels to Montana to go off-roading; Ken Faught takes flight and lands on a backcountry grass strip near Glacier National Park; testing Forest River's Nobo 16.6 Beast Mode off-road trailer.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team hits Yellowstone National Park to see some natural wonders; testing vintage trailer works XTR off-road trailer and introducing Greg Amendola, a legend in the world of vehicle electronics.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The ORTTV team travels to Idaho to drive UTVs and ride the latest electric motorcycles; touring Pro Moto Billet where Wyatt Faught did a summer engineering internship; testing a Hiker Trailer built specifically for off-road.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team tackles extreme terrain in Utah before breaking down and heading back to California for some quick repairs; we return to Utah with a new crew and hit infamous places like Swingarm City, Cathedral Valley, Monument Valley and more.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The ORTTV crew travels to Nelson Ghost Town outside of Las Vegas and shows you an inside look of a Ford Bronco Raptor build for overland; we also give a recap of our favorite moments during our 10,000-mile Alaska trip.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The ORTTV crew tests a Field Van Mercedes Sprinter on a four-state trip through the West Coast; Ken Faught travels to Maui to drive UTVs and then heads to the desert to ride some electric dirt bikes and check out Tim Robel's expedition vehicle.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: We head to Sand Hallow State Park in Utah to go rock crawling with the national champ; Rob and Christjen Johnson test electric motorcycles in upstate New York; we head to Cabo San Lucas to explore this special part of Mexico in UTVs.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: We go overlanding with a $150,000 Jeep and then show you the maintenance tips for your off-road trailer; accessories for transporting your dirt bike, ATV or UTV in a truck, van or toy hauler trailer.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: Exploring the world of adventure motorcycles and showing the Editor's Choice for Must-Have Off-Road Products; a few surprises that will make you want to start planning an amazing off-road travel adventure.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Get to know Dan and the crew through a day in the life at a Harley-Davidson dealership; the crew rides over to Lucky's Saloon for Bike Night, sharing a glimpse of the rich culture behind the Harley-Davidson brand.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: The crew meets up to plan their first major Saturday event, a massive car and motorcycle show held at the dealership; Dan brings in powerhouse celebrity Dave Kindig from Kindig-It Design to check out the blockbuster turnout.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan and Ellen get an exclusive invitation to the Richard Petty Museum to meet the King himself; they take a tour of Petty's garage and childhood home; at the dealership, Rama sells a bike and invites a new customer out on a ride.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Bootlegger's Run, a motorcycle ride with stops at Hog Wild Saloon and Saints and Sinners Tavern; Dan and Ellen meet with the bar owners to get them on board.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: The day of the big ride arrives; hundreds of bikes bring excitement to the dealership as the team manages the unexpected crowd; Dan's friends, moonshiners Tim Smith and Josh Owens, join in on the ride through Bootlegger Country.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan takes a break from the dealership to play in the Richard Petty Charity Golf Classic, but not everyone is a team player when things get heated on the course; back at the dealership, Dusty helps a loyal customer add a mod to his bike.

programme.title: Dealer Life
programme.desc: Dan looks back on the performance of the dealership over the past year. Did he put himself on the map, or does he still have some growing to do? At the dealership, Ellen steals Shannon away for a dramatic makeover that will certainly turn heads.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a well-worn '59 Chevy Apache pickup and shows how to approach a project, whether you are keeping it original or planning on modifying it.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into building a brand-new bed for the '59 Apache right beside the old one!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey goes out on the rails to take a look at the restoration of the 576 Steam Locomotive.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: The Thiokol Swamp Spryte is back in the shop for some much-needed restoration, and replacing the aluminum skin so she will float again; Stacey rolls in the Lil' Red Wagon for some new suspension and 50 years of Skyjacker history.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into the Joe Dirt side of things and how an old, beat up Daytona made it cool to drive old, rusty junk! After that, he shows what it takes to make a high-end replica of a down-and-dirty car.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey demonstrates how to change a four-headlight classic Chevy truck into a two-headlight classic Chevy truck, just by changing some sheet metal. Is it as easy as it looks, or are there some hidden challenges waiting to bite you?

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey takes an old, beat-up '66 Mustang and puts some pep back in Its step. He shows you how to replace an old automatic transmission with a quick-shifting Tremec T5 5-speed, and how to lift an old cab or body off a frame without destroying it.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: What do you get when you take a 4x4 diesel pickup, toss in over 2000hp and mix it with some serious bling? The definition of show and go! Stacey looks at a new twist on tool storage, and sets up a Jeep Gladiator for all your outdoor adventure needs!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: The Stunt Double is back in the shop for its much anticipated reveal and payoff! Inspired by the legendary FALL GUY truck, the Stunt Double is a ground up, frame off build of a classic square body Chevy truck that pays tribute to the stunt world.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in one of the most iconic show cars of the 1970's, the MOD ROD. After that, he shows how to properly disassemble the cab or body of your project, and pre-fit some new components at the same time.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a 1970's Datsun 240Z! Follow along as he digs into the history of these legendary cars and shows some of the great ways to deal with the fragile parts and panels. The old Z cars are still out there. Now is the time to get one going!

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey rolls in a 1970's Datsun 240Z! Follow along as he digs into the history of these legendary cars and shows some of the great ways to deal with the fragile parts and panels. The old Z cars are still out there. Now is the time to get one going!

programme.desc: Conferencias sobre encuentro del significado cristiano en la vida con la lectura de las Sagradas Escrituras.

programme.title: Enfoque Teológico
programme.desc: Estudios de la Biblia, la trascendencia de su mensaje, preguntas y respuestas, revelaciones y su atemporalidad.

programme.title: Orígenes: Diseño inteligente en la genética
programme.desc: Un programa donde se explican los orígenes del planeta y la creación de la Tierra. Además, los métodos de datación de los minerales y otros tópicos respaldan la creencia de un diseño inteligente.

programme.title: Educando Para la Eternidad
programme.desc: Espacio para hacer conciencia sobre los diferentes roles sociales en cuyas manos está el papel de educar en el nombre de Dios.

programme.title: Cuerpo y Espíritu Aeróbicos
programme.desc: Información de estilo de vida saludable con sesiones de ejercicios aeróbicos de intensidad baja a moderada.

programme.title: Las avenidas del alma
programme.desc: Una mirada a los métodos y tácticas que Satanás utiliza a través de los cinco sentidos humanos para llevar a las personas al pecado y corromper sus vidas.

programme.title: Anclas de la Verdad
programme.desc: Un programa con temas muy interesantes sobre las Sagradas Escrituras, llevando el mensaje de Dios.

programme.title: Los niños también alaban
programme.desc: Los niños cantan y alaban al Señor.

programme.title: Los niños también alaban
programme.desc: Los niños cantan y alaban al Señor.

programme.title: Cocina con color
programme.desc: Priscilla y Patricia hacen recetas saludables, nutritivas, divertidas y llenas de color y sabor, fáciles y divertidas.

programme.title: Viva En Abundancia
programme.desc: La salud mental y física, cómo llevar una vida el equilibrio y estar al tanto de los mecanismos de prevención.

programme.title: 3ABN Hoy En Vivo
programme.desc: Diferentes temas de interés basados en las enseñanzas bíblicas con la asistencia de pastores adventistas.

programme.title: La vida, la muerte y la resurrección
Mejor Cada Día
programme.desc: Los problemas que aquejan a la salud y cómo reconocerlos y buscar los mejores recursos para su mejoría.

programme.title: Maravillosa creación
programme.desc: Ciencia y salud, ejercicios, dieta balanceada, consejos para contrarrestar sus problemas físicos y mejorar, con la participación de médicos y expertos.

programme.title: Escrito está
programme.desc: Un programa cristiano internacional de televisión que se dedica a compartir el entendimiento de la palabra de Dios con las personas de todo el mundo.

programme.title: Primicias
programme.desc: La lucha entre el periódico y el canal de noticias es permanente, cada uno trabaja duro por conseguir la primicia. A la cabeza del diario, Américo Baigorria trata de poner paz entre sus propios empleados.

programme.title: Vence
programme.desc: Respuesta a los problemas de la actualidad, las adicciones, el abuso, las crisis extremas y sin salidas.

programme.title: Dios y la Mujer del Siglo 21
Descubriendo los Símbolos del Apocalipsis
programme.desc: Serie profética que estudia el Libro del Apocalipsis como revelación de Jesucristo, cómo buscar la fe y la esperanza.

programme.title: Los mensajes de los tres ángeles
programme.desc: Distintos referentes exponen temas donde se explican y aclaran mensajes relevantes para el día de hoy.

programme.title: Hay Esperanza
programme.desc: Sermones que reflexionan sobre la palabra de Dios, lectura de textos que enseñan lecciones de vida y muestran un camino de luz.

programme.title: A Cristo Adoremos
programme.desc: Estudio bíblico, devocionario que reflexiona sobre la palabra de Dios y el sentido en la vida de los hombres.

programme.title: Valora y mejora tu salud
programme.desc: Se presentan temas relevantes y educativos. Se cuenta con diferentes expositores.

programme.title: Madres de rodillas
programme.desc: Un programa que ayuda a unir a las familias por medio de la oración intercesora. Un grupo de damas comparte experiencias vividas como mujer soltera, mujer casada, como madre y abuela.

programme.title: Salud Total
programme.desc: Métodos para mantener un cuerpo sano, diferentes expertos explican los problemas de salud en el mundo de hoy.

programme.title: Sus Palabras Son Vida
programme.desc: Lectura de diferentes pasajes de la Biblia con la participación del público que sugiere los pasajes bíblicos.

programme.title: Volvamos a la Naturaleza
programme.desc: Música de inspiración combinada con hermosas imágenes.

programme.title: Buenos Días Señor Jesús
programme.desc: Iniciando el día orando y alabando al Señor.

programme.title: Vida en Acción
programme.desc: Rutina de ejercicios fáciles, consejos para una dieta saludable, cómo poner en sus manos su salud a través de la actividad física y vivir bien.

programme.title: Amiguitos de Jesús
programme.desc: Valores morales y espirituales que ayudará a los niños a cultivar un mejor carácter.

programme.desc: The riverboat Amaprima cruises through the heart of Europe in this Christmastime tradition; begin with a pre-cruise tour of Prague, then on to Nuremberg, Regensburg, Passau, Austria's Wachau Valley, Vienna, and finishes in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.title: Road Less Traveled
programme.desc: Jonathan is in Asia's world city, Hong Kong. He uncovers a sect of Jains that practice their religion in a nondescript building, gets a taste of Jeet Kun Do from a Bruce Lee student, and visits the legendary world of Hong Kong's cinema's stuntmen.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Union Island; Marine Park.

programme.title: Top Travel
programme.desc: Jeanie visits Nice while Janez heads home to South Africa.

programme.title: 5 Star Getaways
programme.desc: This series is a sun-filled invitation to travel and visit magnificent all-inclusive 5 star resorts throughout the world, their magnificent surroundings and the exciting excursions one can do at each destination.

programme.title: Tasting America
programme.desc: A tasting tour of three famous restaurants in Santa Barbara, Calif., where golden hillsides cascade into sparkling seas.

programme.title: Wardens
programme.desc: A small community in Montana was shocked by the killing of over 20 deer; region one Wardens think outside the box to put a stop to this heinous crime.

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: (1959) Satirical comedy starring Peter Sellers (in a triple role) and the original Doctor Who, William Hartnell. The world's smallest state, Grand Fenwick, declares war on the USA.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: (1984) It's time to put on make-up. It's time to light the lights. Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzy, the Blues one and the gang embark on a musical adventure as they try to make it on Broadway.

programme.title: The Northman Interview Special
programme.desc: Alexander Skarsgard, Anya Taylor-Joy and director Robert Eggers talk about making their Viking adventure.

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: (1997) Comedy sequel starring Alex D. Linz as a resourceful boy who's stranded at home with chickenpox when a top-secret military microchip comes his way. Can he keep it safe from crooks?

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: (1992) Comedy starring Whoopi Goldberg. A casino singer who witnesses a Mob murder goes into hiding at a convent, where she soon has the choir rocking. With Maggie Smith.

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: (1993) Comedy sequel starring Whoopi Goldberg and Lauryn Hill. Deloris - who's now made it big in Vegas - goes back undercover as a teacher to help a struggling school choir find its voice.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: (1988) Action-thriller with Bruce Willis and Alan Rickman. Can a New York cop free the hostages being held in a skyscraper by an arch villain? Yippee ki-yay... whoops, can't say that here.

programme.title: Apocalypse Now
programme.desc: (1979) Final cut of Coppola's award-laden take on the Vietnam War, with Martin Sheen and Marlon Brando. An assassin travels upriver to terminate a renegade colonel with extreme prejudice.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: (2018) Feel-good British family comedy. Sarah's (Beattie Edmondson) chaotic life gets even more complicated when she inherits a naughty pug from her nan.

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: (2020) Touching adventure with Harrison Ford, based on Jack London's classic novel. A big, friendly hound finds himself unwittingly travelling across late 19th-century North America.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: (1971) Film version of the popular comedy series set in 1940. The Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard, led by Arthur Lowe's Captain Mainwaring, bumble through a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: (1990) Classic family comedy starring Macaulay Culkin. A boy's parents forget to take him on holiday with them. Then two inept burglars turn up. Can our resourceful young hero outwit them?

programme.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
programme.desc: (1992) Family comedy. Macaulay Culkin ends up in a swish New York hotel while his family are in Miami. But the burglars he defeated before (Joe Pesci and Daniel Stern) are back...

programme.title: The Northman
programme.desc: (2022) Epic Viking saga starring Alexander Skarsgård as a warrior prince who goes on the rampage to Iceland to avenge his murdered father. With Ethan Hawke, Nicole Kidman and Björk.

programme.title: Free Guy
programme.desc: (2021) Comedy action starring Ryan Reynolds. Guy lives in Free City. Free City isn't real. Nor is Guy. It's all a big online game. Can he take down the corrupt game publisher?

programme.title: Werewolves Within
programme.desc: (2021) Comedy horror with Milana Vayntrub. A park ranger is sent to a town where everyone is at each other's throats, figuratively at first, but then literally. Is a werewolf to blame?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Deaf Funny 5
programme.desc: Fifth episode of the award-winning sketch show in BSL, with a range of deaf characters. Subtitled for the deaf-impaired.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Carrington, VC
programme.desc: (1954) Anthony Asquith's vivid and subtle courtroom drama casts David Niven as the eponymous officer accused of stealing army money and going absent without leave.

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Classic Ealing thriller filmed in a documentary style, starring Bonar Colleano as a sailor whose smuggling activities lead to him being suspected of murder and going on the run.

programme.title: The Fallen Idol
programme.desc: (1948) Adaptation of Graham Greene's story with Ralph Richardson and Bobby Henrey. A butler who is accused of murdering his wife, has only a schoolboy to fight his corner.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: (2021) Heartfelt fact-based comedy-drama. Kevin Hart stars as a widower who is suddenly sprung into single fatherhood after his wife dies a day after giving birth.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: (2016) Action-comedy with Dwayne Johnson and Kevin Hart. Two former school buddies team up to thwart a terrorist plot. But things may not be as they seem. With Amy Ryan and Jason Bateman.

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: (2022) A gang of violent home-invaders find out the hard way that you REALLY don't want to be on Santa's naughty list, in Tommy Wirkola's dark, violent Christmas comedy. With David Harbour.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: (2003) Action with Colin Farrell and Samuel L Jackson. A loose canon joins an elite force to escort a fugitive to chokey. But the baddie's put a reward out for help with his escape.

programme.title: Mothering Sunday
programme.desc: (2021) Romantic drama with Odessa Young and Olivia Colman. In 20s England, a writer working as a maid has a passionate affair with the rich boy next door. It's not considered a good match.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Arizona Raiders
programme.desc: (1965) William Whitney's brutal western. Two former Confederate rebels are offered their freedom if they can track, catch or even kill their former gang mates. Starring Audie Murphy.

programme.title: Cover Girl
programme.desc: (1944) Rita Hayworth and Gene Kelly star in Charles Vidor's Technicolor comedy musical about a chorus girl's rise to fame. Featuring songs and a score from Jerome Kern and Ira Gershwin.

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: (1952) War drama. Trevor Howard plays the captain of an ageing US warship, gifted to the British navy, which is chosen to lead the raid on Saint-Nazaire in 1942. With Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: (1958) Romantic thriller. George Baker stars as a heroic Cavalier horseman, beating off the Roundhead foe as he single-handedly smuggles the country's aristocracy to safety in France.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: (2018) Comedy. Mark Wahlberg and Rose Byrne star as a couple whose orderly lives are disrupted when they foster three kids. Based on director Sean Anders' own experience.

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: (2005) Violent action-thriller starring Jason Statham as the tough courier Frank Martin, who's hired to guard a government drugs czar's son. But his mission soon lurches towards disaster.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: (2009) Quentin Tarantino's World War II action-adventure. Jewish American soldiers go Nazi-hunting in occupied France. With Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Christoph Waltz and Michael Fassbender.

programme.title: A Private Function
programme.desc: (1984) Michael Palin and Maggie Smith star in Alan Bennett's comedy set in food-rationed post-war Britain. In 1947, an illegally owned pig is secretly being fattened for a royal feast.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: (1952) Civil War-era Western. A unit of Confederate soldiers attack a Union troop to steal gold. Learning that the war is over, they must finish the mission in disguise.

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: (1948) Anthony Asquith's drama based on a famous 1912 court case with Cedric Hardwicke as the father of a boy accused of theft who pursues the case to the highest courts. With Robert Donat.

programme.title: Hell Is a City
programme.desc: (1960) Classic crime thriller with Stanley Baker and Billie Whitelaw. A world-weary detective with a messy private life tracks a violent thief through the streets of Manchester.

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: (1968) Burt Lancaster stars as the angst-ridden middle-aged man who decides to swim home via neighbour's pools in Frank and Eleanor Perry's superb allegorical drama.

programme.title: A Room with a View
programme.desc: (1985) Helena Bonham Carter stars in this Merchant/Ivory film as an innocent on holiday in Florence, where a meeting with Julian Sands leads to romance.

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: (2008) Violent action-thriller with Jason Statham. Terrorists hire a courier to drive a kidnapped woman across Europe, on a journey that gets ever more dangerous.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: (2014) World War II action with Brad Pitt. A tank commander leads his crew into the dark, bloody heart of Hitler's last stand. But there's a rookie on board the Fury. With Michael Peña.

programme.title: Monos
programme.desc: (2019) Alejandro Landes's hallucinatory war film. A ragtag band of teenage soldiers, who live on a mountaintop in Latin America, guard an American hostage with their lives. In Spanish/subs.

programme.title: Weekend Recharge
programme.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which includes helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.

programme.title: Deadline to Disaster
programme.desc: Downslope winds gusting over 100 miles per hour drive an enormous wildfire into residential areas around Boulder, Colo., forcing a frantic evacuation.

programme.title: Deadline to Disaster
programme.desc: Residents fear for their lives as Florida's Gulf Coast is struck by a powerful Category 4 Hurricane, bringing deadly surge and catastrophic winds.

programme.title: Deadline to Disaster
programme.desc: A tornado outbreak erupts over central Iowa on July 19, 2018; after an EF3 tornado makes a direct hit on a heavy equipment plant filled with hundreds of workers and guests, another EF3 twister tears directly down Marshalltown's main street.

programme.title: Timber Titans
programme.desc: The heli logging team from Integrated Operations return to The Narrows to salvage high grade cedar from the forest floor. Tsideldel crews salvage what's left of a massive wildfire as part of a pioneering biomass experiment.

programme.title: Timber Titans
programme.desc: The Peters crew grinds through some of the biggest logs of the season, while old iron and thick fog threaten to shut them down; up north, after a two-year drought, Freya Logging battles relentless rain as fall takes hold of the community forest.

programme.title: Timber Titans
programme.desc: Four logging companies in British Columbia fight extreme weather and terrain to ethically harvest one of Canada's most vital resources.

programme.title: Weird Earth
programme.desc: A giant ice stack on a remote lake spouts a strange vapor, dazzling jeweled objects litter a dank cave floor and a man's shout causes a lake to bizarrely react with thousands of ripples.

programme.title: Weird Earth
programme.desc: Threatening blue lights bombard a famous resort town, evoking the apocalypse, a nuclear meltdown could be behind an ominous blazing beam of light and supersized, underground crystals appear out of this world.

programme.title: Weird Earth
programme.desc: Huge sand dunes bellow sinister sounds as loud as a jackhammer; a churning mud pot mysteriously goes on a rampage, destroying infrastructure; and a river, linked to a national tragedy, mysteriously vanishes.

programme.title: Heroes & Survivors
programme.desc: Two flights go wrong, forcing pilots to ditch their planes far from the safety of airport runways to save their passengers; an 80-year-old pilot puts his light airplane down on a glacier; Capt. Sully Sullenberger lands his plane on the Hudson River.

programme.title: Heroes & Survivors
programme.desc: A package courier pits the power of prayer against a giant tornado; a big wave rider battles for life in a battering offshore surf break.

programme.title: Heroes & Survivors
programme.desc: A band of brothers rescue one of their own from a watery grave; a helicopter team saves first responders caught in deadly seas.

programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

But as Blane spends time in the cow town, he realizes that the conventional wisdom is all wrong. Arapahoe has been made a scapegoat for crimes perpetrated by power-hungry rancher Sam Drummond (George Rosener). As Blane attempts to report the truth, he finds himself caught in the middle of a dangerous feud between cattlemen and settlers.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E7 Lone Gun Amarillo Ames asks Cheyenne to help drive a herd of cattle to Dodge City and take over the mission if he perishes. When Ames dies, Cheyenne must forcefully take on the Laverson brothers, who do not want him in charge of the drive.

programme.title: Only the Valiant
programme.desc: A cavalry officer is blamed by his men and his lady for the death of a popular officer. Now, he must find a way to stop an Indian attack on their fort. It might prove to be the only way to regain the trust of his men and the affection of his woman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E33 Death Trap Lucas and Mark find a wounded man and bring him into North Fork to save his life. Lucas asks Simon Battle, a gunfighter-turned-doctor, to help the man. The wounded man's enemies have other plans in store.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E3 The Mutton Puncher An attractive businesswoman named Thora Flagg needs help to move her herd of sheep into town. However, cattle boss Ben Creed, who is Cheyenne's boss, stands in the way. During a poker game, Cheyenne finds himself caught in the middle.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend's outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Mill Tom Edwards is in a wheelchair and holds Ben Cartwright responsible for his condition. When Tom turns to drinking to ease his pain, the Cartwrights work together to help him find purpose in his life again.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E5 The Hopefuls Jacob Darien is leading his family through Virginia City when they are accosted. Adam Cartwright and his new traveling companion, Sam Bord, step in to help. Adam offers to escort them, unaware that Sam is planning a robbery.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tom Fitzpatrick: Steadfast Frontiersman By the 1840s, the fur trade is ending, forcing lifelong frontiersmen like Tom Fitzpatrick to adapt. When he becomes a guide for some of the first Americans to emigrate to California, he faces new dangers even as his way of life is becoming obsolete.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Gold Rush Detectives When gold goes missing from a safe in a remote mining town, Wells Fargo sends detectives Henry Johnson and Isaiah Lees to hunt down the culprits. Though the two men couldn't be more different, they must learn to work together to crack the case.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E5 The Quick and the Deadly On his stop to pick up prisoners for Huntsville, Cheyenne learns of Deputy Gary Thomas' conviction of a crime. He believes that the banker's son, Jud Ainley is behind Thomas' arrest and begins unraveling the truth.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Jud Steele Story A posse pursues Jud Steele, a wanted gunslinger, and his partner. They join the wagon train to rest their horses. Steele dies trying to steal fresh horses. Hawks returns his belongings to the sheriff, who says Steele died five years ago.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E15 Six Years and a Day Mrs. Marston is in dire need of a doctor after problems arise as she is giving birth. Mark and Lucas try to help but they need Doc Burrage, who is out of town. More problems come when two men arrive at the McCain Ranch intent on killing the doctor.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend's outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Mill Tom Edwards is in a wheelchair and holds Ben Cartwright responsible for his condition. When Tom turns to drinking to ease his pain, the Cartwrights work together to help him find purpose in his life again.

programme.desc: S2 E5 The Hopefuls Jacob Darien is leading his family through Virginia City when they are accosted. Adam Cartwright and his new traveling companion, Sam Bord, step in to help. Adam offers to escort them, unaware that Sam is planning a robbery.

programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Jud Steele Story A posse pursues Jud Steele, a wanted gunslinger, and his partner. They join the wagon train to rest their horses. Steele dies trying to steal fresh horses. Hawks returns his belongings to the sheriff, who says Steele died five years ago.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E7 The Assailants When Senator Jim Borden visits North Fork, Marshal Micah Torrance receives a telegram stating an assassination attempt could be made on the senator's life. The plot begins to unfold as four gunman disguised as cavalrymen arrive with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E15 Suspicion Lucas and Mark find Winslow Quince stranded in the desert with a broken wagon wheel. They stop to help, and when they get to North Fork with Quince, many note his gold coin purchases and lavish gifts. Lucas is suspicious, and townsfolk want answers.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 1 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial line in the sand. South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this dead line with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that endangers the town's beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial line in the sand. South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this dead line with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town's beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the slow

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E9 Rendezvous at Red Rock A bank robber guilty of murder frees Cheyenne after he's accused of the crime and lures him in on a deal to rob a bank in Red Rock. However, Cheyenne foils the bank robber's plans after he meets the town's marshal.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: The Rifleman

After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E9 Rendezvous at Red Rock A bank robber guilty of murder frees Cheyenne after he's accused of the crime and lures him in on a deal to rob a bank in Red Rock. However, Cheyenne foils the bank robber's plans after he meets the town's marshal.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E3 Unsaddled and Unraveled Booger heads to Austin to work with a former contestant in preparation for the Road to the Horse competition. He quickly realizes that there's more to this competition than handling a colt, and presentation has a lot to do with his score. Cody finds the perfect herd to start a special cattle sale and shares his idea for the business with Bubba, but he is hesitant. Once Booger is back, the cowboys meet to discuss the future of their business, but they don't all see eye-to-eye. Cody and Bubba want to be supportive of Booger but are frustrated that his dedication to the Road to the Horse competition has taken priority over their business. The lack of direction causes tension between the cowboys. Feeling divided, they all start to question the future of their business.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E4 Buckskin for the Win! The cowboys are unable to decide on exactly how they want to move their business forward. In the meantime, they continue to take day jobs to stay afloat. With Cody still fixated on the specialty cattle sale, Misty encourages him to do it on his own, without the help of Bubba and Booger. A new opportunity falls in Bubba's lap to operate a ranch for a group of organic feed investors. While it seems to be a dream role for Bubba, he struggles with the fact that it would require him to move his family north and away from the other cowboys. After much anticipation and practice, Booger heads to Kentucky for the Road to the Horse competition, where he faces the challenge of managing an unruly horse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: Christmas in Maple Hills
programme.desc: Valerie Warrick is shocked to learn that her family's land is registered to a mysterious D Property Company. Days before Christmas, she teams with a handsome travelling doctor to unravel the mystery to her family's past and her heart's future.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E9 The Brahma Bull Cheyenne stops to visit his friend Sam Varney. When Varney's son, Harper, tries to rescue his Brahma bull calf from a barn fire with no success, he's badly injured. Cheyenne decides to bring him another bull, but trouble ensues during his journey.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E10 The Wedding Rings After a stray bullet kills a young boy's father, Cheyenne befriends Pepe and takes him to his mother in Mexico. They meet Pepe's grandfather, a rising dictator of a province who's demanding tax payments in the form of wedding rings from villagers.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Fear Merchants The Cartwrights help a Chinese-American stable hand who finds himself accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate, Andrew Fulmer, a bigoted man who wants all foreigners to leave Virginia City.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E3 Unsaddled and Unraveled Booger heads to Austin to work with a former contestant in preparation for the Road to the Horse competition. He quickly realizes that there's more to this competition than handling a colt, and presentation has a lot to do with his score. Cody finds the perfect herd to start a special cattle sale and shares his idea for the business with Bubba, but he is hesitant. Once Booger is back, the cowboys meet to discuss the future of their business, but they don't all see eye-to-eye. Cody and Bubba want to be supportive of Booger but are frustrated that his dedication to the Road to the Horse competition has taken priority over their business. The lack of direction causes tension between the cowboys. Feeling divided, they all start to question the future of their business.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E4 Buckskin for the Win! The cowboys are unable to decide on exactly how they want to move their business forward. In the meantime, they continue to take day jobs to stay afloat. With Cody still fixated on the specialty cattle sale, Misty encourages him to do it on his own, without the help of Bubba and Booger. A new opportunity falls in Bubba's lap to operate a ranch for a group of organic feed investors. While it seems to be a dream role for Bubba, he struggles with the fact that it would require him to move his family north and away from the other cowboys. After much anticipation and practice, Booger heads to Kentucky for the Road to the Horse competition, where he faces the challenge of managing an unruly horse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: Christmas in Maple Hills
programme.desc: Valerie Warrick is shocked to learn that her family's land is registered to a mysterious D Property Company. Days before Christmas, she teams with a handsome travelling doctor to unravel the mystery to her family's past and her heart's future.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E9 The Brahma Bull Cheyenne stops to visit his friend Sam Varney. When Varney's son, Harper, tries to rescue his Brahma bull calf from a barn fire with no success, he's badly injured. Cheyenne decides to bring him another bull, but trouble ensues during his journey.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E10 The Wedding Rings After a stray bullet kills a young boy's father, Cheyenne befriends Pepe and takes him to his mother in Mexico. They meet Pepe's grandfather, a rising dictator of a province who's demanding tax payments in the form of wedding rings from villagers.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Fear Merchants The Cartwrights help a Chinese-American stable hand who finds himself accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate, Andrew Fulmer, a bigoted man who wants all foreigners to leave Virginia City.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E5 Buck Up, Cowboy With Booger still at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba are left to do the day-to-day work. Bubba surprises Cody with news that he has to head to Mississippi to help his father-in-law. Cody has to take care of the ranch by himself, adding to his frustrations with the business. Luckily for him, Misty steps in to help. Bubba breaks the news to Kaley's parents that they might be moving north for a new job opportunity. After a bit of hesitation, they show their support - just in time for Bubba and Kaley to check out a ranch that could potentially be their future home. Cody visits possible sites for his specialty cattle sale and feels discouraged until he comes across the perfect location. Meanwhile, Booger starts the second round in the Road to the Horse competition, and things don't go as planned. In the end, he makes a tough decision and puts what's best for the horse ahead of winning.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E6 Partnership Hits the Fan While volunteering with kids in the community, Cody makes a connection with a possible buyer for his specialty cattle sale. With Booger still away at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba recruit a friend to help with the work on the ranch. Cody rushes to finish up for the day, determined to make it home in time for his son's first haircut, but in his haste, he ends up hurting himself. Bubba visits an organic ranch in Texas to learn more about the organic business. To test the product, he cooks up store brand and grass-fed steaks to compare the taste and make sure it is something he can get behind. Booger finally gets home after the competition and immediately receives an opportunity to train horses in Austin. After spending some time apart, the cowboys come together to talk about the future of their partnership. Things take a turn for the worse when the meeting between friends gets heated, leaving the fate of their business up in the air.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E13 A Friend in Need A man named Carl Avery kidnaps Mark and demands a $5,000 ransom for his safe return. Lucas mortgages his ranch to a longtime friend for the money. When Lucas delivers the ransom, he discovers his friend is part of the disturbing kidnapping plot.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E14 Skull Lucas and Mark are separated on a hunting trip. During his search, Lucas enters Skull Ranch, a headquarters for outlaws. The gang forces him to help break out two members from jail. Lucas has no choice after he learns they've captured Mark as well.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Legend of the Blue-Eyed Apache When eleven-year-old Herman Lehmann is torn away from his frontier home by an Apache raiding party, he must adapt in order to survive. He soon forgets the life he unwillingly left behind and is adopted by an Apache family. For close to a decade, he lives as a Native American, learning their language and customs. Eventually, he even joins the same type of raiding party that separated him from his family. Though the years pass by, Herman's mother never gives up hope that she will be reunited with her son. One day, she hears a rumor of a blue-eyed Apache now living on a reservation. Could this be her long-lost son? Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Herman's mother to uncover the real story of the blue-eyed Apache.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes' guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes' adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E6 Tom Fitzpatrick: Trapper, Trader, Legend Although from humble beginnings, Tom Fitzpatrick is ambitious and intelligent. When he joins up with William Ashley's trapping expedition, he proves himself to be an invaluable member of the company, both as a hardy frontiersman and a shrewd businessman. Along with legendary mountain man Jedediah Smith, Fitzpatrick rediscovers the South Pass through the Rocky Mountains, opening the pathway that will enable western expansion for decades to come. Fitzpatrick quickly rises to the top of the fur trade and eventually takes over the company he once worked for, but he nearly loses everything when he takes a wrong turn while leading a supply train. Alone in the wilderness, he finds himself in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a band of Gros Ventre warriors. Somehow, Fitzpatrick must survive the harrowing trek back to safety without a horse, gun, or supplies.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E4 Between Rock Creek and a Hard Place After getting in an argument with a Union Army recruiter, Noah becomes the prime suspect of murder when the recruiter turns up dead. The riders become involved in the investigation. Meanwhile, Noah befriends Quinn and his sister Cassie.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E11 The Idol Cheyenne agrees to transport a new schoolteacher and her young son Gabe to Creek Point. The Kirby brothers disrupt Cheyenne's plans when they mistake him for a notorious gunslinger Ben Shelby, who they aim to kill.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E12 One Way Ticket While traveling by train to Denver with prisoner Cole Younger, Cheyenne runs into problems. Friends of Younger try to free him by kidnapping the brakeman, and a beautiful widow and her son distract Cheyenne along the way.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Spanish Grant The Cartwrights are in a battle over the validity of a Spanish land grant. They plan to stop the De La Cuesta family from seizing part of the Ponderosa along with all of the Carson Valley settlers' homestead lands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E32 The Woman The residents force Miss Adams, the North Fork schoolteacher, to leave her job because they feel she is too progressive for supporting women's right to vote. Lucas gets involved and he learns that lies have been circulated by a past student.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E33 The Money Gun Lucas has a disdain for Oat Jackford since years ago he burned down his ranch to get him off property he wanted. When hired killer Tom King arrives in North Fork and is on Oat's trail, Lucas decides to side with and help the man he once hated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E34 A Matter of Faith A trail bum rides into North Fork during one of the worst droughts in years. He claims that he can bring rain to their town. Many believe that he's a water witcher, but a railroad boss resents his intrusion and wants him gone.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E5 Buck Up, Cowboy With Booger still at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba are left to do the day-to-day work. programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E34 A Matter of Faith A trail bum rides into North Fork during one of the worst droughts in years. He claims that he can bring rain to their town. Many believe that he's a water witcher, but a railroad boss resents his intrusion and wants him gone.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E7 Friends or Foes? When their conversation about their partnership hits a wall, each cowboy decides to branch out and focus on their individual pursuits. Booger completes a job for an acquaintance who asks him to find a horse for his teenage granddaughter. The search for the right horse proves to be challenging, but he finally finds one gentle enough for an amateur rider. The experience reminds Booger of how passionate he is about working with horses, and he decides to accept the offer to train them in Austin. Struggling to find buyers for his specialty cattle sale, Cody meets with the Cattle Association Board to pitch the specialty sale to them and secure buyers. Bubba heads north to show the investors a location for the organic ranch, but when they don't show up, he starts to wonder if this deal was a big mistake. Booger, Cody, and Bubba meet up and decide to sell off their entire herd, officially putting their partnership on hold. Jaclyn comes up with a plan to mend Booger and C

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E8 Friends 'Til the End While visiting family in Mississippi, Cody secures prize cattle for his specialty sale, but one small mistake puts the deal in jeopardy. In anticipation of their move north, Bubba and Kaley visit their favorite places around town and take a trip down memory lane. Bubba breaks the news to his mother about the organic farm. After he catches her up on his current situation with the other cowboys, she encourages him to make things right. Booger heads to Austin, where he learns how to work with English-style horses and receives an offer to train horses for the entire summer. Booger returns home and gets a big surprise when Jaclyn introduces him to their newest family member. Cody reaches out to Booger and Bubba to get them all together so they can make amends and work out their differences. The cowboys consider taking a big job in Texas and working together again.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E15 The Princess Lucas and Mark find a young woman named Jennifer and her ill brother, Charles, hiding in their barn. Doc Burrage treats the boy for measles and they take refuge at the McCain Ranch, but soon Lucas learns that she may be a runaway princess from Europe.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E16 Gunfire Infamous outlaw Charlie Gordo is in the North Fork Jail waiting for the U.S. Marshal to take him to Yuma for hanging. Micah learns that the lawman is dead, and Gordo's gang is arriving soon. Micah, Lucas, and others defend the jail from the gang.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E6 Bass Reeves: Trailblazing Lawman After escaping the bonds of slavery, Bass Reeves takes refuge among the indigenous people of The Indian Territory, where he is welcomed into their culture. When the Civil War ends, his new-found tracking skills and fluency in native languages lead to his appointment as the first Black Deputy U.S. Marshal west of the Mississippi River. Though he faces discrimination from his peers, Reeves earns their respect when he accepts Judge Isaac Parker's daunting order to hunt down one of the most ruthless killers in The Indian Territory and bring him back dead or alive. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Judge Parker to learn more about the amazing career of Bass Reeves, who goes on to arrest 3,000 felons, kill 14 men in self-defense, and complete 32 years of service without being wounded.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E7 Wild Bill Hickok & the First Quick-Draw Duel Wild Bill Hickok and his buddy, Davis Tutt, see their friendship fall apart over gambling debts and the affections of a beautiful woman. After Tutt swipes Wild Bill's prized timepiece as payback for a disputed debt, things begin to heat up. Then, when Tutt parades through town with the watch in one hand and Hickok's former girlfriend in the other, Wild Bill's blood begins to boil. Tutt refuses to return the watch, and he continues to flaunt the beautiful woman on his arm. The two men meet in the middle of town to settle their differences once and for all in what will become the very first quick-draw duel of the Old West. Both men reach for their pistols at the same time and fire! In an attempt to separate the truth from the fiction, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews George Ward Nichols, the journalist who immortalized the duel and created the legend of Wild Bill Hickok.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E3 Jim Beckwourth: War Chief of the Crow When former slave Jim Beckwourth heads west to seek work as a trapper, he begins what will become one of the most eventful, heroic lives of all the mountain men. As a joke, one of Beckwourth's fellow trappers tells a group of Crow warriors that Beckwourth is a long-lost member of their tribe, and the adventure begins. Adopted by the Crow, Beckwourth joins them in a series of ferocious battles with other tribes, becomes a war chief, and falls in love with a fierce female warrior named Pine Leaf. He then uses his hard-won influence with the Crow to convince them to provide furs to the powerful American Fur Company. But an unexpected visit from legendary trapper and old friend Tom Fitzpatrick sets off a violent collision that forces Beckwourth to choose between the two worlds he loves.

programme.title: Global Passport
programme.desc: Join host Christina Cindrich in a winter wonderland and arctic adventure that is unlike any other experience on Earth. Finnish Lapland is filled with moments that combine surreal, magic, and mind-blowing into never to be forgotten memories.

programme.title: Top Travel
programme.desc: Janez and Jeannie are reunited in Barcelona as they explore the structures of Antoni Gaudi and experience the water-sport of flyboarding.

programme.title: Travel in Style
programme.desc: Singapore mixes the East and the West, while Toronto is a well-established major city in Canada; while both differ in many ways, one can be sure that either destination will be a trip to remember.

programme.title: Behind the Gates
programme.desc: A very modern house with an ingenious floor plan; a swanky contemporary house in west Hollywood; a stunning Australian design.

programme.title: Private Islands
programme.desc: Showing how to locate a secluded paradise.

programme.desc: Explorers journey to idyllic places to try local cuisine, find out what destinations have to offer and share travel trips along the way.

programme.title: Dream Cruises
programme.desc: A 17-night cruise from Sydney to Bali.

programme.title: Selling Mega Mansions
programme.desc: In California, Tom, Serena and their three children are ready to trade Pasadena living for the Beverley Hills Flats; they ask agent Camille Anderson to find them an ultra modern estate and a classic Spanish villa for consideration.

programme.title: Find Me a Vacation Home
programme.desc: Property hunters look for luxurious vacation homes where paradise is in the backyard.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With the American Civil War looming, construction of the Pacific railroad is being held up in Kansas, sabotaged by Confederate sympathizers. The government dispatches an Army engineer, John Nelson (Sterling Hayden), to oversee construction, and he initially rubs the wrong way both his proud boss (Barton MacLane) and his boss's feisty daughter (Eve Miller). Eventually, though, both fall for Nelson's charms, and the hero seeks to uncover the Southern rat so he can lead the Union men due west.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: In this Christmas classic, an old man going by the name of Kris Kringle (Edmund Gwenn) fills in for an intoxicated Santa in Macy's annual Thanksgiving Day parade. Kringle proves to be such a hit that he is soon appearing regularly at the chain's main store in midtown Manhattan. When Kringle surprises customers and employees alike by claiming that he really is Santa Claus, it leads to a court case to determine his mental health and, more importantly, his authenticity.

programme.title: Pocketful of Miracles
programme.desc: Beggar Apple Annie (Bette Davis) learns that her daughter, escorted by an aristocratic suitor, plans to visit. It's great news -- except that she has tricked her daughter into believing she is a wealthy socialite. Fearing her true identity will disappoint, Annie petitions a superstitious mobster (Glenn Ford), who thinks the apples she sells are lucky, for help. Hesitant at first, the mafioso is persuaded by his girlfriend (Hope Lange) to disguise Annie, if only long enough to fool her daughter.

programme.title: Westward the Women
programme.desc: There's a deficit of good, honest women in the West, and Roy Whitman (John McIntire) wants to change that. His solution is to bring a caravan of over 100 mail-order brides from Chicago to California. It will be a long, difficult and dangerous journey for the women. So Whitman hires hardened, cynical Buck Wyatt (Robert Taylor) to be their guide across the inhospitable frontier. But as disaster strikes on the trail, Buck just might discover that these women are stronger than he thinks.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: The honorable Calem Ware (Randolph Scott), marshal of the Wild West boomtown of Medicine Bend, attempts to defuse the simmering tensions in his rapidly growing and increasingly violent town, as a greedy businessman (Warner Anderson) hires a sinister black-gloved gunman (Michael Pate) to take care of his problems with the marshal for good. Meanwhile, a traveling song-and-dance troupe arrives in town, bearing Ware's lost love, Tally (Angela Lansbury), who holds the secret to his violent past.

programme.title: Come to the Stable
programme.desc: In this heartwarming 1949 film, Sister Margaret (Loretta Young) and Sister Scholastica (Celeste Holm) arrive unannounced and determined to build a children's hospital in the small New England town of Bethlehem. They seek to fulfill a promise they made to God when he saved a similar infirmary in war-torn Normandy. To build it, the sisters recruit various townspeople, negotiate with a bookie (Thomas Gomez) for the land and contend with a songwriter (Hugh Marlowe) who's set against the project.

programme.title: Room for One More
programme.desc: Poppy (Cary Grant) and Anna Rose (Betsy Drake) have a soft spot for young people in need. Despite having three children of their own, they can't help but take action when they meet a pair of troubled young orphans. Young Jane (Iris Mann) is horribly depressed, while Jimmy (Clifford Tatum Jr.) is physically disabled and has a long history as a troublemaker. As they welcome the pair into their home, the Roses use love and understanding to help the orphans get to the bottom of their problems.

programme.title: Young at Heart
programme.desc: Gregory Tuttle (Robert Keith), a widowed musician, is the father of three extraordinarily gifted daughters, Laurie (Doris Day), Fran (Dorothy Malone) and Amy (Elisabeth Fraser), all of whom are facing different romantic troubles. The arrival of two handsome musicians, Alex Burke (Gig Young) and Barney Sloan (Frank Sinatra), who have been invited by Gregory to board at the house while working on a new musical, further complicates the daughters' love lives.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: 25 Words or Less
programme.desc: Teams compete to see who can guess secret words or phrases with a limited amount of clues and time; host Meredith Vieira.

programme.title: 25 Words or Less
programme.desc: Teams compete to see who can guess secret words or phrases with a limited amount of clues and time; host Meredith Vieira.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune

The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: Jeff Hephner challenges contestants who are ranked based on their answers to trivia questions for a chance at $10,000; every question counts, as each answer can propel them to the top or to the bottom, where they'll be in jeopardy of elimination.

programme.title: Split Second
programme.desc: John Michael Higgins presents three contestants with a question and three possible choices and whoever buzzes in fastest earns the right to answer first.

programme.title: Tic Tac Dough
programme.desc: Two contestants compete to place three marks in a row on trivia board avoiding a dragon that can steal turns; the winner faces the dragon in a final round where it blocks three-in-a-row attempts to prevent the $10,000 prize win.

programme.title: Bingo Blitz
programme.desc: Contestants compete in a dynamic blend of trivia and bingo.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: Steve Harvey assumes the hosting duties for this daytime game show in which five members of one family are pitted against five members of another family. Each team's goal is to guess the results of audience survey questions. A player from each team initially faces off, answering the question to earn the chance to either pass or play. The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: A heart-racing quiz show where three competitors face off against the Chaser, a ruthless quiz genius determined to stop them from winning cash prizes. Each episode is a fast-paced battle of brainpower, where contestants are challenged to think faster than they ever thought possible to answer up to 166 questions across all topics.

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: Everyday people battle a variety of trivia questions and a 40-foot wall for a chance to win millions of dollars. Each pair of deserving contestants, from siblings to spouses to best friends, has a plan to use the life-changing winnings for good things. But defeating the wall is no easy feat. Executive Producer LeBron James' game is a true test of both knowledge and poise. With momentary changes between fortune and failure, the outcome is as unpredictable as the bounce of the ball.

programme.title: 25 Words or Less
